dict.string: TetraTrack needs location access to record your horse riding routes, even when the app is in the background.
TetraTrack needs location access to record your horse riding routes.
TetraTrack uses your health data to display heart rate during rides and track your fitness progress.
TetraTrack saves your rides as workouts in Apple Health to track your equestrian fitness.
TetraTrack sends notifications to alert you when family members may need assistance during their ride.
TetraTrack can display photos taken during your rides to help you remember your adventures.
TetraTrack uses speech recognition for hands-free voice notes during training sessions.
TetraTrack uses the microphone to record voice notes during your training sessions.
TetraTrack uses the camera to scan shooting targets and automatically detect and score shot holes.
TetraTrack displays music playback controls so you can manage your music while riding.
